Soft Skills EN.Name: Strategic advising within retail/vendors
Soft Skills EN.Question: I can provide thorough strategic advice and the client listens to me in that.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I can provide a thorough strategic advice and the client listens to me at that.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Perform client-oriented
Soft Skills EN.Question: I can provide a company-wide and founded presentation of work, opinions or a strategy to a variety of clients
Soft Skills EN.Description: I can provide a company-wide and founded presentation of work, opinions or a strategy to a variety of clients

Soft Skills EN.Name: Maintain contacts with clients
Soft Skills EN.Question: With regard to commercial content and as a human being I can build up and maintain pleasant relations with a variety of clients.
Soft Skills EN.Description: With regard to commercial contents and as a human being I can build up and maintain pleasant relations with a variety of clients.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Work neatly and deal with materials
Soft Skills EN.Question: I always see to it that my work and working methods are neat and that my working environment is cared-for.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I always see to it that my work and working method are neat and that my working environment is cared-for.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Can deal with details
Soft Skills EN.Question: I have an eye for details and always give them attention.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I have an eye for details and always give them attention.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Perseverance: continuously show effort
Soft Skills EN.Question: I continue until I have achieved what I must do or have intended to do.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I continue until I have achieved what I must do or have intended to do.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Be consequent, perseverance
Soft Skills EN.Question: One can always count on me since I keep the agreements I have made with myself or with others.
Soft Skills EN.Description: One can always count on my since I keep the agreements I made with myself or with others.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Collaborate
Soft Skills EN.Question: I can collaborate pleasantly with various colleagues, and because of that I know how to improve the final result.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I can collaborate pleasantly with various colleagues, and because of that I know how to improve the final result.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Able to adapt oneself
Soft Skills EN.Question: I can quickly adapt myself if, during an assignment, the criteria, the assignment itself, or a complete briefing change without having any influence on that myself
Soft Skills EN.Description: I can quickly adapt myself if during an assignment criteria, the assignment itself, or a complete briefing change without having any influence on that myself.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Think and work company-oriented
Soft Skills EN.Question: I find it more important that the client or the Quince organisation is satisfied than that I get what I want.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I find it more important that the client or the organisation X is satisfied than that I get what I want.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Can work methodically
Soft Skills EN.Question: I can think in phases and work in terms of start-up, lead time, and completion (done but also completed) of an assignment, and always act on this.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I can think in phases and work in terms of start-up, lead time, and completion (done but also completed) of an assignment and always act on this.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Excellence: good is not good enough
Soft Skills EN.Question: If an assignment is ready I even do a little extra by at least checking all the details and research for points of improvement which I can implement within a reasonable period of time
Soft Skills EN.Description: If an assignment is ready I even do a little extra by at least checking all the details and research for points of improvement which I can implement within a reasonable period of time.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Can use representative manners
Soft Skills EN.Question: I adjust my clothes, attitude and behaviour if the situation and/or the company I am with requires such
Soft Skills EN.Description: I adjust my clothes, attitude and behaviour if the situation and/or company I am with requires so.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Self-employability
Soft Skills EN.Question: Without anyone having to tell me this, I do my work, and in case of being under-occupied I make sure that I find and pick up new activities.
Soft Skills EN.Description: Without anyone having to tell me this, I do my work and in case of under load I see to it that I find and pick up new activities.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Can switch fast
Soft Skills EN.Question: I can quickly think about one assignment after another, understand the context and assignment, and translate this into goal-oriented actions.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I can quickly think about one assignment after the other, understand the context and assignment, and translate this into goal-oriented actions

Soft Skills EN.Name: Can act flexibly
Soft Skills EN.Question: I realise that within Quince assignments, procedures and situations can change, focus myself on that, can easily adapt myself to that, and know how to keep acting in the interests of the objective.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I realise that within X assignments, procedures and situations can change, focus myself on that, can easily adapt myself to that, and know how to keep acting in the interests of the objective.

Soft Skills EN.Name: Perform under pressure/immune to stress
Soft Skills EN.Question: I don't allow myself to be distracted by unexpected issues, work overload or time pressure.
Soft Skills EN.Description: I don't let myself distracted by unexpected issues, work overload or time pressure

Hard Skills EN.Name: Strategic advising within retail/vendors
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can provide strategic advice and the client listens to me in that.
Hard Skills EN.Description: I can provide a strategic advice and the client listens to me at that.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Present (technique)
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can provide a founded presentation of work, opinions or a strategy to the client or within Quince.
Hard Skills EN.Description: I can provide a founded presentation of work, opinions or a strategy to the client or within X.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Contacts with clients
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can deal with a variety of clients.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Concept methodical
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can think up and formulate a concept with the corresponding elements (such as way of communication or means), in which these add up or enhance each other.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Concept graphical
Hard Skills EN.Question: Within a reasonable period of time I can come up completely independently with graphically supported solutions within a chosen concept, strategy or sub-strategy.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Elaborate design
Hard Skills EN.Question: Within a reasonable period of time I can independently formulate and implement a chosen design into various ways and means.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Concept Copy
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can come up with surprising, inspiring texts or textual approaches that enhance or pass on a message, concept, strategy or sub-strategy.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Copy (body copy)
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can textually pass on a message.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Typography knowledge of fonts, application, etc.
Hard Skills EN.Question: I have an eye for graphical compositions, proportions and typography within a design.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Photography
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can handle both a (digital) photo camera and lighting and take a picture that expresses what I have in mind.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Retouch
Hard Skills EN.Question: I know how to realistically modify pictures in such a way that the viewer does not see my input or modifications.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Think DTP
Hard Skills EN.Question: Based on an existing design or modifications of a designer I can quickly visualise or formulate an image, set up and implement patterns in which I am consistent in form and composition

Hard Skills EN.Name: Budgeting
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can budget a project in advance, in which I take time, money, quality, uncertainties and the requirements and wishes of the client into account.

Hard Skills EN.Name: General planning
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can always assess well the time that I or others need, map the coherence between this and determine, monitor and meet deadlines.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Traffic and Purchase
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can supply the necessary goods or externally hired people at the right place and the right time, in which I always take price and quality into account.

Hard Skills EN.Name: Create project document
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can describe a project in a document including all relevant functions, description of concepts and formulations, in which that document suffices in order to implement the necessary working assignments, and can be distributed both internally and externally to clients

Hard Skills EN.Name: Verbal briefing
Hard Skills EN.Question: I can provide for a verbal briefing as a result of which the listeners know exactly what has to be carried out and which internal and external client expectations have to be complied with

Hard Skills EN.Name: Written briefing
Hard Skills EN.Question: On the basis of a project document or on the basis of input from the client or a colleague I can formulate a working assignment with all relevant information for the person (implementer) with which he/she can carry out the activities independently
